mapper.select: select id,check_user_id,machine_id,type,create_time from inno72_check_sign_in where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y%M') = DATE_FORMAT(#{createTime},'%Y%M') and machine_id=#{machineId} and check_user_id=#{checkUserId} and status=0
select count(1) from inno72_check_sign_in where DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') and machine_id=#{machineId} and check_user_id=#{checkUserId}

select csi.check_user_id checkUserId,DATE_FORMAT(csi.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') signDateStr ,1 AS type,csi.machine_id machineId,DATE_FORMAT(csi.create_time, '%H:%m:%s') as signTimeStr from inno72_check_sign_in csi where csi.status=0 and csi.check_user_id=#{checkUserId} and csi.machine_id=#{machineId} and DATE_FORMAT(csi.create_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(#{signDateStr},'%Y%m') UNION all select cf.submit_id checkUserId,DATE_FORMAT(cf.submit_time,'%Y-%m-%d') signDateStr ,2 AS type,cf.machine_id machineId,DATE_FORMAT(cf.submit_time, '%H:%m:%s') as signTimeStr from inno72_check_fault cf where cf.submit_id=#{checkUserId} and cf.machine_id=#{machineId} and DATE_FORMAT(cf.submit_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(#{signDateStr},'%Y%m')
